channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @JoelKatz @jeffjarvis @mmasnick @ACLU I’m sorry I have no idea what this is about. I don’t agree with your conclusion, which is weird because you’re saying that’s what I think. But it’s late, my stomach is full and I’m watching a dramatic NBA game.
@JoelKatz @jeffjarvis @mmasnick @ACLU Helps me? I’m just sharing what I see.
How does she sleep at night? https://t.co/7xbF5m9UpS
Most of New York State Moves to High Alert for Coronavirus. https://t.co/fusRG50MiI
@TaylorLorenz This is why we want to do all this outside the silos, on the open web.
A new startup coalition wants to change how social media sites control followers. https://t.co/9MPDf5a4ez
@WichitaCindy Now I wish I spoke French.
Steampipe: select * from cloud; https://t.co/qlVVvFc8N7
@JeffBezos Twitter-as-a-service from AWS would kick ass. I hope you do it. I'd love to test it. Big fan. ;-)
Heh he's starting to talk like Musk. I love it. Hope AWS comes out with Twitter-as-a-service. https://t.co/ovESsIan1a
@MarkVopat @JoeDuncko Please take me off the cc list. Thanks. (Second request.)
@JoeDuncko @MarkVopat guys i don't have any thoughts! have a great day. ;-)
Peloton is releasing a rowing machine. https://t.co/wTehRICVyM
@SarahSquirm -- when are you going to be on SNL again?
The New York Times Has Badly Lost Its Bearings. https://t.co/Wn251K9HKa
@corikesler what is it??

Why don't the Democrats usurp Make America Great Again. It's really what it's about. The New Deal, The Great Society. Roe v Wade. These are the very specific things Dems did and want to do more of. Never has the divide been clearer.
@SteveBrant I'm soooo glad they have a block command in twitter. goodbye. ;-)
@dwitzel i think forking is actually the way to go. but i doubt that journalism will let them do it.
Mark Esper's Duty to Speak. https://t.co/te3vy7U2Du
@SteveBrant btw, no one who can create a half-dozen companies, complex ones, that solve heretofore unsolved hard problems, could be a "disaster" at human stuff. quite the opposite.
@workout_fox absolutely!

@workout_fox i doubt if that's the way it started, btw. i think he was sincerely interested in running twitter. but now that it's slipping away from him, i can't imagine he won't compete in some way. i hope he does.
